title: Can we pray in the same clothes we slept in? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: abdullah says can we pray in the same clothes we slept in the answer is yes you can pray in any type of clothes abdullah it doesn't matter whether you slept in it you ate in it you worked out in it what matters is that it fulfills the conditions of prayer which we know that among them is one purity so the clothes themselves must not have any impure substances such as urine medi etc secondly it must cover your aura and these two are part of the conditions of salat you
